titleStmt.title: The barren trees doome a sermon preached at Newbery on the fifth day of August. Beeing the day of his Maiesties most happy deliuerance from the bloudy conspiracie of the Earle of Gowry and his brother Alexander. By Bartholomevv Parsons Batchelour in Diuinitie, and vicar of Collingborne Kingstone in the countie of Wiltes.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Bartholomew, 1574-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Mathevv Lavv, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Fox,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Fox
